description: The Lions Head Japanese Maple (Acer palmatum 'Shishigashira') is an amazing plant species with striking features. This particularly hardy deciduous makes an eye-catching statement in the garden with its dense foliage, spiraling branches and upright habit. Its highly ornamental foliage morphs from a golden hue to pink and crimson leaves in the fall. It's an ideal choice for small spaces. The multi-season interest and easy maintenance of this reliable species ensures year-round beauty in a garden.
